Methods.Name: Constructors.LocalStorage
Usage: var ls = PAGE.Constructors.LocalStorage (string parentName, object options)
Methods.Description: A normalized way of dealing with localStorage and or cookie data as JSON formatted text. Each new instance represents a single property of the window.localStorage object.

Definitions.parentName: The name of the window.localStorage property
Definitions.options: Object with options to pass in
Definitions.options.useCookie: Boolean value, forces system to use cookies instead of localStorage

Methods.Name: batch.tryFinish
Methods.Description: Upon defining a new new batch each callback runs tryFinish until the total count is reached.
